allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: credential generation now saves correctly to Supabase

- Fixed field name: createdAt -> created_at to match Supabase table schema
- Added field normalization in setAccounts to handle both naming conventions
- Added better error logging for Supabase insert failures
- Throw error instead of silent fallback so UI shows proper error

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
